column1: #Text=Al powders (99.9%, Aladdin, China), Se powders (99.9%, Aladdin,\rChina) and Sn shot (99.9%, Aladdin, China) were carefully weighted\raccording to the atomic ratio of AlxSn1-xSe.
#Text=The mixtures were\rloaded into a quartz ampoule, vacuumed at 10\3 Pa and sealed.
#Text=It\rtook over 12 h heating the ampoule to 1273 K.
#Text=Then, we kept the\rtemperature for another 24 h.
#Text=Finally, the ampoule was cooled\rdown to room temperature in the furnace.
#Text=The shots were ground\rto powders with an agate mortar.
#Text=And powders with size under\r4.5 mmwere achieved after sieving.
#Text=The powderswere then put into\ra graphite container with 20 mm diameter and hot-pressed at\r873 K under the pressure over 60 MPa in vacuum for 1 h.
#Text=The\rrelative density of obtained ingot was not less than 96%.
